data.actual_result: i am throwed back to red "new messages" bar
data.expected_result: i should exit preview to point i left
data.short_description: exiting image preview move you back to new messages bar
data.steps_to_repro: - make sure that: red "new message" bar will go offscreen if scrolled to bottom and that image is last in room (it is also possible it's connected with how long you didn't saw that channel, longer seem to work always) - scroll to image on bottom of channel - enter preview by tapping image and press download button - place back button to exit preview
